channel.title: Custom restarter
channel.description:
ok i need restarter where u can choose the file to restart......... where i find.... search button didn't help....neitehr did g00gle..... don't be a n00b and say...just search it or stuff like that...
i just need a restarter that you can't see.....but u can still access in the taskbar that runs the file i want it to....is there a such thing?

item.title: Custom restarter
item.dc:creator: @Adelmas Adelmas
item.description:
@Adelmas wrote:

@echo off
title Restarter
echo ========================
echo Restarting...
echo ========================
tskill java /a
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
color 0a
cls
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
cls

Read full topic
